name: Lady DeBug
description:
This satisfying puzzle game was created in 96 hours by a 3-person team for the magnificent GMC Jam #48. It will certainly make you think, hopefully make you laugh, and possibly make you cry as you explore the unique puzzles and help the bug debug its own game!

Be a ladybug. Avoid venomous spiders. Fix the glitches holding you back from eating the Delicious Leaf of Destiny (definitely just made that up).

Jam theme: Glitches and Bugs

Average playtime: 15-20 minutes

The game consists of 8 thoughtfully designed levels with 'think-outside-the-box' mechanics and unexpected solutions, beautiful, minimalistic artwork, and an incredible soundtrack designed to make the game feel fully immersive.

We hope you enjoy this fun little experience; feel free to leave a rating and comment if you do :)
